channel.title: Thread 3
channel.description:
[b]Yo, used core pking base.
Server - Project Insanity Client - Galkons [REF I believe]
So heres the issue:
Ive repacked all my maps so theres none missing [525] Then started the old rs orbs, and added zoom buttoms.
When I teleport: [OR LOGIN AT THE LOCATION I TELEPORTED]
#Frozen.
[img]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/27u7jtvnehukcbr/FUCK%20SAKE.png[/img]
[b]Replaced my Method54() { to the old one I had in client [Dont think I changed it anyway :confused:]
Anything else that could be causing this? [Has randomly started lmao]
NOTE: To log back in I either delete my char file or change character.posx = XXXX; or YYYY...

item.title: Thread 3
item.dc:creator: @vortex vortex
item.description:
@vortex wrote:

i think i know why youre having issues, see the line in your error that says “client.mainGameProcessor”?
im pretty sure this means that the error is because your cpu is going bad, try running on a different computer

Read full topic
